Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object

      vm.VendingMachine

public class VendingMachine
extends java.util.Observable

Author:
Rutuja

This class defines a Vending Machine. It extends from Observable.

Constructor Detail

VendingMachine

public VendingMachine()
Method Detail

BuyItemWithCash

public double BuyItemWithCash(int itemCode,
                              double amount)
Parameters:
itemCode - The item code of the food item which is being bought
amount - The amount the user has entered
Returns:
The balance or -1 or -2

set currBalance = currBalance + amount
if currBalance > price, return (currBalance-price), and set balance = price, currBalance = 0
if currBalance == price, return (0), and set balance = price, currBalance = 0
if currBalance < price, return (-1)
if item doesn't exist or Quantity is 0, return (-2)

CancelBuyOperation

public double CancelBuyOperation(double amount)
Parameters:
amount - The Amount entered in the Vending Machine
Returns:
amount or change

If amount is entered more than once to make it equal to the food item's price,
then set the change = currentBalance which is total amount entered for the transaction
and return change
Otherwise, return the amount entered

DisplayNutritionalInfo

public boolean DisplayNutritionalInfo(int itemCode)
Parameters:
itemCode - Item Code of the Food Item whose Nutritional Info is required
Returns:
boolean value
True - if stock is present
False - if stock is not present

ChangePrice

public boolean ChangePrice(int itemCode,
                           double newPrice)
Parameters:
itemCode - item Code of the Food Item whose price is to be changed
newPrice - New Price to be set
Returns:
boolean value
True - If price is changed
False - if stock is not present


After setting the price of the food item to new price,
it marks this Observable object as having been changed and
notifies the Observers of the changes made.

AddFoodItem

public boolean AddFoodItem(double price,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           double calories,
                           double sugar,
                           double fats,
                           int quantity)
Parameters:
price - Price of new Food Item
description - Description of the new Food Item
calories - Calorific value of new Food Item
sugar - Sugar contents of new Food Item - in gms
fats - Fat Contents of new Food Item - in gms
quantity - Quantity of new Food Item
Returns:
boolean value
True - if new Food Item added in the Hashtable
False - if new Food Item not added in the Hashtable, because of some value already present at the given key.

UpdateQuantity

public boolean UpdateQuantity(int itemCode,
                              int quantity)
Parameters:
itemCode - Item Code of the Food Item whose quantity is to be updated
quantity - New quantity
Returns:
boolean value
True - If quantity updated
False - If quantity not updated, because that food item is not present

RemoveFoodItem

Parameters:

Returns:
boolean value

False - If Food Item not removed, because that food item is not present

GetQuantity

Parameters:
itemCode - Item Code of Food Item whose quantity is required
Returns:
quantity or -1

-1 - when the food item is not present

WriteXMLToFile

Parameters:
writer - An instance of BufferedWriter to write text to a character-output stream


This method writes the vending Machine data to the database file in the XML format.
